content:
During his visit to Turkey, President Volodymyr Zelenskyy visited Turkey in Istanbul, where Corvets are being built for our Navy.

This is said inmessageHead of State in Telegrams.

«I got acquainted with the degree of readiness and equipment of the corvette" Ivan Mazepa ". He communicated with the Navy of Ukraine. Thank you for the service. We add strength to our country, ”Volodymyr Zelenskyy said.

He also got acquainted with the course of construction of our second Corvette of the ADA class, whichassignedHetman Ivan Vyhovsky's name.

"I thank the partnership of the President of the Turkish Republic and all defense companies of Turkey and Ukraine, who work together for the sake of making peace closer and reliable," the President added.
title: President of Ukraine in Istanbul inspected the construction of corvettes for the Navy of the Armed Forces
description: This is stated in the message of the head of state in the telegram channel. “I got acquainted with ...
